file_content.text: It's about time you picked up. Davit's near-death, Hanley and Crissom aren't much better!
The Imps have us locked down tight and--and you're not with CorSec, so I'm going to guess that Checkpoint Lambda's been overrun too.
I hope you're feeling generous, because our whole mission is in jeopardy unless someone out there can help us.
I'll have the Imps off of you as soon as I can get there.
Tell me how to find you.
No! There's something more important.
If I knew more about your mission, I might be able to help.
What sort of mission is it?
When the Empire occupied Corellia, they took control of a powerful tool to fight the Republic.
I'm listening, but talk fast.
The Empire's got us trapped, but while they're busy you could complete our objective.
There's a network of surveillance cameras, SurvNet, that covers the city and feeds back into monitoring stations here at CorSec Academy.
My squad was supposed to infiltrate the academy and disable those stations; right now, the Republic can't blink without the Imps seeing it.
I can see why those stations need to go. What about you?
I'll take care of the stations
Don't forget about us, just make sure those stations get disabled first.
My squad and I are in the main building--we took out the monitors here before the Imps found us, but there are more nearby.
Stay sharp, and hurry. We'll see you when you get here.
Your lives are more important than the monitoring stations.
I won't just leave you.
We can probably hold, as long as you're fast--we disabled the doors so the Imps have to cut their way in.
I'm not interested.
You interested in visiting the families of my dead officers? Because they are buying time with their blood in here.
We locked down the monitoring stations in the academy's main building, but there are still plenty of them in the outlying structures.
Master Jedi, we've got the Imps focused on us--with your skills, you might be able to disable the remaining stations.
You're a soldier--while we've got the Imps distracted, can you take out the remaining stations?
Right now, the Imps don't know you're here. That means you can take out the rest of the monitoring stations.
Don't worry, Officer. As soon as the stations are disabled, I'll come help you.
I'll handle them, and save you
I'll do as you ask, but I won't forget about your team.
Stations first, then you.
Keep your head down, Officer. I'll be there as soon as the stations are out of commission.
I'll take care of it.
You want me to blow stuff up? I'm happy to oblige.
Sure, I can do that.
I can't wait to thank you in person. Find us in the main building after the job's done.
Have it your way.
I appreciate it. We'll hole up in the main building and wait for you to come find us.
I'll send help as soon as I find someone who cares.
I can't help. [Refuse quest]
You can't just leave! What kind of--
